00010 ORMultiEventCounter::~ORMultiEventCounter()
00011 {
00012   for(size_t i=0; i < fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00013     delete fDataProcessors[i];
00014   }
00015 }

00017 void ORMultiEventCounter::AddEventCounterDecoder(ORVEventCounterDecoder* eventCounterDecoder)
00018 {
00019   ORCompoundDataProcessor::AddProcessor(new OREventCounter(eventCounterDecoder));
00020 }

00022 void ORMultiEventCounter::AddProcessor(ORDataProcessor* processor)
00023 {
00024   ORLog(kWarning) << "You may not use ORMultiEventCounter::AddProcessor(" 
00025                   << processor->GetDecoder()->GetDataObjectPath() << ")." 
00026                   << endl;

00029 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORMultiEventCounter::EndRun()
00030 {
00031   ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndRun();
00032   if (fRunContext) {
00033     ORLog(kRoutine) << "Event counts for run " << fRunContext->GetRunNumber() << endl;
00034   }
00035   for(size_t i=0; i < fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00036     ORLog(kRoutine) << fDataProcessors[i]->GetDecoder()->GetDataObjectPath()
00037                     << " had " << ((OREventCounter*) fDataProcessors[i])->GetEventCount() 
00038                     << " events." << endl;
00039   }
00040   return kSuccess;
00041 }
